text.div:
SHR MammaprintRiskScoreInterpretationVS ValueSet

Intepretation of Mammaprint Recurrence Score

name: MammaprintRiskScoreInterpretationVS
title: SHR MammaprintRiskScoreInterpretationVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

concept.display: Score between 0.0 and +1.0, meaning a patient has on average a 10% chance that her cancer will recur within 10 years without any additional adjuvant treatment, either hormonal therapy or chemotherapy.
Score between -1.0 and 0.0, meaning a patient has a 29% chance that her cancer will recur within 10 years without any additional adjuvant treatment, either hormonal therapy or chemotherapy.
